who do not attend. Components of the programme include nutrition counselling for EBF 
less than 6 months of age, complementary feeding less than 24 months of age, and hygienic 
practices; micronutrient distribution for children (iron and vitamin A); medication distribution 
for illness; antenatal care (newborn visits); and referral to the health facility as needed ( 19).
Evaluation of the AIN-C was planned as a pre- and post-intervention, project and control
